fields.text: Welcome to First Round Capital, San Francisco's premier seed-stage venture capital firm.
Press [INDEX] if you are an entrepreneur interested in discussing seed-stage funding.
Press [INDEX] to submit a new pitch deck to our investment team.
Press [INDEX] to check the status of your funding application.
Please hold while we connect you to our investment review team.
Please hold while we check the status of your application, one moment please.
Press [INDEX] if you are an existing portfolio founder or investor looking for support.
Press [INDEX] for portfolio company support and resources.
Press [INDEX] to connect with our investor relations team.
Please hold for portfolio support; a specialist will be with you shortly.
Please hold while we connect you to investor relations.
